## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G32280](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G32280)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>VCC</u>
- **Gene Name:** VASCULATURE COMPLEXITY AND CONNECTIVITY
- **Description:**   GPI inositol-deacylase C, putative (DUF1218);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2062561
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:

   - [SALK_047972C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Abnormal leaves. Increased lobing of rosette leaves.
